files.README.md:
# Claude Code Skills Marketplace

A collection of reusable plugins for [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/claude-code).

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| [use-devbox](./plugins/use-devbox) | Search and install packages using devbox when a tool or command is missing |

## Installation

### Using Claude Code (Recommended)

Install all plugins from this marketplace:

```
/plugin marketplace add tungpun/skills
/plugin add tungpun/skills/use-devbox
```

### Install Individual Plugin

```
/plugin add tungpun/skills/use-devbox
```


## Author

Tung Pun ([@tungpun](https://github.com/tungpun))

## License

MIT
files.plugins/use-devbox/README.md:
# Use Devbox

Search and install packages using devbox when a tool or command is missing or unavailable in the local environment.

## When to Use

- A command or tool is not found (e.g., "command not found", "jq: not found")
- User asks to install a package or tool
- A build or script fails due to missing dependencies
- User wants to search for available packages

plugins.name: use-devbox
plugins.description: Search and install packages using devbox when a tool or command is missing
